changeSet.author: jbeam
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Accounts] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Accounts_Departments_DepartmentID] FOREIGN KEY([DepartmentID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Departments] ([DepartmentID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Accounts] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Accounts_Departments_DepartmentID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Addresses] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Addresses_ItemTypes_AddressTypeItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([AddressTypeItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Addresses] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Addresses_ItemTypes_AddressTypeItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[ChargeCodes] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_ChargeCodes_Departments_DepartmentID] FOREIGN KEY([DepartmentID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Departments] ([DepartmentID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[ChargeCodes] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_ChargeCodes_Departments_DepartmentID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Departments] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Departments_ItemTypes_DataSourcceIDItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([DataSourcceIDItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Departments] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Departments_ItemTypes_DataSourcceIDItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Departments] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Departments_ItemTypes_DepartmentTypeIDItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([DepartmentTypeIDItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Departments] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Departments_ItemTypes_DepartmentTypeIDItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Departments] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Departments_ItemTypes_GroupPolicyItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([GroupPolicyItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Departments] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Departments_ItemTypes_GroupPolicyItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_Accounts_AccountID] FOREIGN KEY([AccountID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Accounts] ([AccountID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_Accounts_AccountID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_Addresses_AddressID] FOREIGN KEY([AddressID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Addresses] ([AddressID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_Addresses_AddressID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_ChargeCodes_ChargeCodeID] FOREIGN KEY([ChargeCodeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ChargeCodes] ([ChargeCodeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_ChargeCodes_ChargeCodeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_Departments_DepartmentID] FOREIGN KEY([DepartmentID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Departments] ([DepartmentID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_Departments_DepartmentID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_ItemTypes_DataSourceIDItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([DataSourceIDItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_ItemTypes_DataSourceIDItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_JobCodes_JobCodeID] FOREIGN KEY([JobCodeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[JobCodes] ([JobCodeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_JobCodes_JobCodeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_PayTypes_PayTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([PayTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[PayTypes] ([PayTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Entities] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_Entities_PayTypes_PayTypeID]
